attributes.action: Stop unregistered charity organisations collecting for military & veterans.
attributes.additional_details: There are currently investigations taking place around the UK into these so called charities. They are taking the publics money on the pretence of supporting military & veteran causes. Then not declaring what they are actually donating,which is very little or nothing. This should be classed as fraudulent representation and made illegal.
attributes.background: Currently there are organisations allegedly collecting on behalf of military and veterans who are not charities or declaring the percentage of donations and to who they are donating.
